channel.title: Need alot of help please
channel.description:
I am wondering if anyone can tell me how to a few things. 1. Fix my fight pits, players can't attack each other in there. 2. Change the amount of xp a skill gives, like woodcutting. 3. How to fix my clan chat
If you can, can you help me? All I need to know is how to fix them.
